here it is
```sum(check_equality(
    Symmetric([rand()   -rand();
                     0   rand()])) for _ in 1:100_000) # all false```

Yeah that's right, the implementations of `eigen` and friends in LinearAlgebra special-cases for diagonal and hermitian matrices, and different conventions are then enforced. Sounds like StaticArrays uses one of those conventions for all matrices.
